resources.string: I Don\'t nessisarily like school. But its better thain doing nothing all summer.
I Love Games, And always have. They have shaped my life. They have shaped my intrests. They Showed me technology That I love now.
I Love Programming and plan to use it in my future. It uses my favorite thing. logic. It gives. me the power to make the computer do what i want.
I Love Camping. Ive done it since i was little. It gives me the change to be closer to nature. Apart from my schooling and technology.
I love Food. I eat it every day. It helps me keep going. It empowers me to live my life and to change my life.
